Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is prone to mechanical failure due to high operating temperature and structural stiffness.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Numerical studies of a SOFC with different gas flow channel structures were carried out to evaluate channel structures impact on species and heat transport, cell performance, the stress concentration and thermal stress distribution.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The accuracy and reliability of numerical model were verified by comparing with an experimental result.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is found that cell performance of the SOFC is affected by gas flow channel structure, which leads to the difference of temperature field and ultimately affects the thermal stress distribution in the cell.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: By changing the cross sections of the gas flow channels from rectangle to arch and round trapezoid, stress concentration is effectively alleviated and the thermal stress of the interconnect is significantly reduced.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The magnitude of stress at the interface between different components is reduced by 18.2 to 40%.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The work provides a valuable reference for SOFC stack structure design and insight on its operations.
Titulo: Evaluation of gas channel structures on cell performance and thermal stress in a solid oxide fuel cell
